segments.text: I'm watching the two children, and they're quite the team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance on that wobbly stool is impressive, yet terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One leg of the stool is clearly splayed out, it could go any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate, probably to catch all the stolen goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below looks so excited and expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is out, ready for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly stealthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how focused they are on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't give way with all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a truly disastrous fall for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, but with added peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really picked their moment, with the adult so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a bold move, going for the cookie jar in broad daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR
